show.Name: Heroic Battle
show.Description: Watch your favorite superheroes come together for an epic showdown.

show.Name: Superhero Stunt Spectacular
show.Description: An action-packed stunt show featuring incredible feats and daring rescues.

show.Name: Villains vs Heroes
show.Description: See the ultimate clash between the most infamous villains and beloved heroes.

show.Name: Hero Academy
show.Description: Join a training session where superheroes demonstrate their powers and skills.

show.Name: Justice League Live
show.Description: Experience the Justice League in action as they save the world.

show.Name: Superhero Musical
show.Description: A musical extravaganza featuring songs and dances from popular superhero movies.

show.Name: Mario Kart Live
show.Description: Watch as Mario and friends race through a real-life Mario Kart course.

show.Name: Princess Peach's Party
show.Description: Join Princess Peach for a fun-filled party with games and entertainment.

show.Name: Bowser's Challenge
show.Description: Witness Bowser and Mario face off in an epic showdown.

show.Name: Luigi's Mansion Adventure
show.Description: Follow Luigi on a spooky adventure to capture ghosts and save the day.

show.Name: Yoshi's Island Safari
show.Description: Join Yoshi on a safari through a vibrant, animated island.

show.Name: Super Mario Musical
show.Description: A lively musical featuring all your favorite characters from the Mario universe.

show.Name: Mickey's Magical Parade
show.Description: Enjoy a whimsical parade with Mickey and all his Disney friends.

show.Name: Frozen Sing-Along
show.Description: Sing along with Anna, Elsa, and Olaf in this interactive show.

show.Name: Pirates of the Caribbean Adventure
show.Description: Join Captain Jack Sparrow on a swashbuckling adventure.

show.Name: Beauty and the Beast Live
show.Description: Experience the enchanting story of Beauty and the Beast live on stage.

show.Name: Disney Princess Dance Party
show.Description: Dance and sing with your favorite Disney princesses.

show.Name: Toy Story Mania
show.Description: Join Woody, Buzz, and the gang for a fun-filled Toy Story adventure.

show.Name: Galactic Journey
show.Description: Travel through the cosmos in this spectacular space-themed show.

show.Name: Star Warriors
show.Description: Join the star warriors in their battle to save the galaxy.

show.Name: Alien Encounter
show.Description: Experience a thrilling encounter with extraterrestrial beings.

show.Name: Cosmic Dance Party
show.Description: Dance the night away with aliens and astronauts under the stars.

show.Name: Journey to the Moon
show.Description: Join a mission to the moon in this exciting space adventure.

show.Name: Starlight Spectacular
show.Description: A dazzling light show set to the music of the cosmos.
